titles.title: Health Maintenance Organization Amendments of 1987
A bill to repeal health maintenance organization authorities.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 12/1/1987--Introduced. Health Maintenance Organization Amendments of 1987 - Repeals all sections of title XIII (Health Maintenance Organizations) of the Public Health Service Act, except provisions relating to administration of assistance programs and to loan guarantees and loans. Removes from such remaining provisions: (1) a requirement that reports which must be submitted upon the expiration of a loan or loan guarantee period contain matters as required by the Secretary of Health and Human Services by regulation; and (2) references to the making of new loans or loan guarantees. Makes technical and conforming amendments.
